argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_ax-hv0cl | |- 0h e. ~H |
| 2 |  | #P_normsub | |- ( ( 0h e. ~H /\ A e. ~H ) -> ( normh ` ( 0h -h A ) ) = ( normh ` ( A -h 0h ) ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_mpan | |- ( A e. ~H -> ( normh ` ( 0h -h A ) ) = ( normh ` ( A -h 0h ) ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_hv2neg | |- ( A e. ~H -> ( 0h -h A ) = ( -u 1 .h A ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( A e. ~H -> ( normh ` ( 0h -h A ) ) = ( normh ` ( -u 1 .h A ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_hvsub0 | |- ( A e. ~H -> ( A -h 0h ) = A ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( A e. ~H -> ( normh ` ( A -h 0h ) ) = ( normh ` A ) ) |
| 8 | 3, 5, 7 | #P_3eqtr3d | |- ( A e. ~H -> ( normh ` ( -u 1 .h A ) ) = ( normh ` A ) ) |
